name: Pet Chef Little Secret Game 2
description:
Be a kitchen chef and use the food maker things to cook different dishes in this Pet chef little secret game. Here, we included lots of interesting views like chef's dress up, kitchen cleaning, cutting fruits, cake decorate, microwave cleaning, pizza making and much more. First of all, use your creativity to collect & cutting fruits and vegetables. Then show your cooking skills and make delicious pizza. In cake decorating view use various tools like cake toppers, icing and food coloring. After that, you need to clean and repair microwave using various things. Once you are complete all the cooking activity, you have to implement kitchen clean activity. At last, choose an amazing dress up for chef and give him a perfect look.

Features:

- Select chef's outfit
- Have a fun by making various dishes
- Perform cleaning activity properly.
- Cut fruits & vegetables carefully
- Decorate a yummy cake
- Improve your cooking skill with help of chef
